text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
After her humiliating defeat in the<n>exhibition
race, Symboli Rudolf no<n>longer believes she
deserves to call<n>herself the Emperor.

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
But despite her bitter tears, I gently<n>reassure her
that she was, and still is,<n>worthy. And, as if to
prove it...

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
She lifts her head to see a crowd of<n>Umamusume.
The students she devoted<n>herself to have turned
out in force to<n>support her.

text_block_list.name: Mon贸logo
text_block_list.text:
Her fierce will blazes in her eyes once<n>more as she
remembers what it truly<n>means to be the Emperor.
